name.description: The name of the firebase function project.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the firebase function project?

directory.description: A directory where the function is placed.

app.description: The name of the parent Nx firebase application project this function will be added to.
app.x-prompt: Which firebase Nx application project will this function be created for?

tags.description: Add tags to the project (used for linting)

setParserOptionsProject.description: Whether or not to configure the ESLint `parserOptions.project` option. We do not do this by default for lint performance reasons.

strict.description: Whether to enable tsconfig strict mode or not.

format.description: The module format for this function (esm or cjs).

runTime.description: The node runtime target for this function.
